items.sentence: Does anyone have any idea what this is all about?
Tom and Mary introduced themselves to each other.

Tom and Mary are the best friends I\'ve ever had.
It was raining in Boston on the day Tom was shot.
This might take a lot more time than we expected.

Tom and Mary haven\'t been happy for a long time.
I think that would only take about three minutes.
